## PassState class


**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class PassState 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(context)](./toygl.passstate._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>PassState</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [blendingEnabled](./toygl.passstate.blendingenabled.md) |  | boolean | When defined, this overrides the blending property of a [DrawCommand](./toygl.drawcommand.md)<!-- -->'s render state. This is used to, for example, to allow the renderer to turn off blending during the picking pass. <p> When this is <code>undefined</code>, the [DrawCommand](./toygl.drawcommand.md)<!-- -->'s property is used. </p> |
|  [context](./toygl.passstate.context.md) |  | [Context](./toygl.context.md) | The context used to execute commands for this pass. |
|  [framebuffer](./toygl.passstate.framebuffer.md) |  | [Framebuffer](./toygl.framebuffer.md) | The framebuffer to render to. This framebuffer is used unless a [DrawCommand](./toygl.drawcommand.md) or [ClearCommand](./toygl.clearcommand.md) explicitly define a framebuffer, which is used for off-screen rendering. |
|  [scissorTest](./toygl.passstate.scissortest.md) |  | { enabled: boolean; rectangle: [BoundingRectangle](./toygl.boundingrectangle.md)<!-- -->; } | When defined, this overrides the scissor test property of a [DrawCommand](./toygl.drawcommand.md)<!-- -->'s render state. This is used to, for example, to allow the renderer to scissor out the pick region during the picking pass. <p> When this is <code>undefined</code>, the [DrawCommand](./toygl.drawcommand.md)<!-- -->'s property is used. </p> |
|  [viewport](./toygl.passstate.viewport.md) |  | [BoundingRectangle](./toygl.boundingrectangle.md) | The viewport used when one is not defined by a [DrawCommand](./toygl.drawcommand.md)<!-- -->'s render state. |
